events.text: It kinda sucks how like, more and more no one can afford anything...
Like, those that are lucky enough to have resources and opportunity and wealth just buy everything up.
Its a race to purchase all of the last avaliable property and soon there wont be anything left to buy.
Like, from then on out there will be a permenant class divide...
the owner class, who have all the property and wealth and businesses...
and then the rest of us, who weren't lucky enough to make it over the line
Ya know? Like, thats the end phase of capitalism.
If you couldn't afford to purchase your slot before times up, you'll be stuck forever in the renters class.
There just simply won't be anything you can afford, or anything for sale.
And the owners just get to make all the rules, cutting costs, increasing their profits...
until things get so shitty no one can take it anymore...
